name: Drill Bit Extension 2/4/6/12’’, Magnetic Bit Holder 4 Pcs, Drill Extension Bit Holder 1/4’’ Hex, Bit Holder for Impact Driver CR-V Steel Quick Release for Screwdriver Bit Nut Drill Socket by XIOGZAXI
short_description: 【DOUBLE LOCK】 The drill bit extension has a locking device at the interface, which, together with the slight magnetism at the bottom of the hole, ensures that the screwdriver bit or drill bit is securely fastened in place and reduces the likelihood of the screwdriver bit or drill bit wobbling and falling out. Simply slide the locking device on the magnetic bit holder when in use to change bits quickly and easily, greatly improving work efficiency.

【PREMIUM QUALITY MATERIAL】 The bit holder for impact driver is made of industrial heavy-duty chrome vanadium steel for greater hardness and long life. This drill extension bit holder is perfect for your impact driver or drill bit set.

【UNIVERSAL USE FOR 1/4 INCH】 The quick release bit holder works with most 1/4 inch blades or hex bits, the impact bit holder itself has a 1/4 inch hex shank. This drill extension is a must have in your toolbox.

【WIDE USE】 The impact extension is suitable for electric screwdrivers, pneumatic screwdrivers, hand screwdrivers, t-handle 1/4’’ screwdrivers, corded drills, cordless drills, pneumatic drills, impact drills, or any other device with a 1/4 inch hex shank. The drill bit extender is perfect for maintenance repairs or diy work in automotive, hardware, home and other fields.

【PACKAGE CONTENT】 Includes 4 locking bit holders in 4 lengths, 2 inches (60 mm), 4 inches (100 mm), 6 inches (150 mm) and 12 inches (295 mm). Whether it's a simple home project or a complex professional job, this magnetic drill bit holder will ensure you have the perfect tool for any situation.

name: 2PCS Forstner Bit Extension Set with Anti-Slip Design,Adding Over 3.28"&5.64" Drilling Depth to Forstner Bit,Suitable for Process Wooden Furniture,Timber and etc.
short_description: Simple & Efficient:When we need to drill deeper holes in certain woods,normal forstner bits are often not long enough;So we offer two extensions for drilling depths of 3.28" and 5.64" deeper,which require only simple installation for deeper holes

Non-slip Design:The traditional forstner drill extensions were prone to slipping when working with hardwoods, so we developed a non-slip design for the part that attaches to the drill rig, so that the drill jaws can firmly grip the extension

Note:The inside diameter of our forstner drill bit extension collet is 3/8 inch,so it will only fit forstner drill bits with 3/8 inch or smaller shanks;Tighten the screw before use to prevent the drill bit from slipping when rotating at high speed

Good Tools Require Good Materials:Our extension poles are built with rugged,high carbon steel for structural stability,with precision ground and polished surfaces;The shanks are 3/8" in diameter and will fit most drills
Great Value Set:Cost-effective set,1PCS Forstner Bit Extension (3.28" Drilling Depth) +1PCS Forstner Bit Extension (5.64" Drilling Depth)+1PCS hex key
product_description: ★ Forstner Bit Extension Set +++Size:Length-4.48" (3.28" Drilling Depth)+6.81"(5.64" Drilling Depth) +++Material:High-carbon steel +++Shank:3/8" ★ Features: ——We developed a non-slip design for the part that attaches to the drill rig, so that the drill jaws can firmly grip the extension while rotating at high speeds, further preventing work errors. ——The inside diameter of our forstner drill bit extension collet is 3/8 inch, so this extension will only fit forstner drill bits with 3/8 inch or smaller shanks, please check the size to see if it will fit your drill bit before purchasing. ——Please note to tighten the screw before use to prevent the drill bit from slipping and falling off when rotating at high speed. ——Our extension poles are built with rugged, high carbon steel for structural stability, with precision ground and polished surfaces. ——The shanks are 3/8" in diameter and will fit most drills. Please note that Forstner drill bits should be larger than 0.8" in diameter to prevent the protruding part of the set screw from scratching the hole wall when drilling. ★ Attention: 1.Due to the different monitor and light effect, the actual color of the item might be slightly different from the color showed on the pictures. 2.Please allow little measuring deviation due to manual measurement.

name: Diablo Universal Extension for Drills - For Cordless and Corded Impact and Drill Drivers - 1/4" Hex Shank, 12" Length - DXT1020
short_description: Extend Reach - Provides 12 inches of extension, allowing access to hard-to-reach areas with your power tools.
Impact Strong Technology - Enhances shank stability and durability for use with cordless and corded impact drivers.
Quick-Change Feature - Effortlessly switch between accessories and sizes without requiring additional tools.
Versatile Compatibility - Optimized for maximum performance in both cordless and corded impact and drill drivers.
No Tools Required - Simplifies accessory changes, reducing downtime and increasing productivity.
product_description: Extend your drilling capabilities with the Diablo 1/4" x 12" Universal Extension for Drills. Perfectly designed to provide access to hard-to-reach areas, this extension is equipped with Impact Strong technology, ensuring enhanced shank stability and durability. Ideal for use with both cordless and corded impact drivers and drills, it offers quick and easy switching between accessories, thanks to its quick-change feature. Whether you're dealing with tight spots or extended reach tasks, this extension delivers maximum performance and versatility, making it an essential tool in your collection.
